name: pinched
content:

A pinched face is thin and pale: He had that pinched look that suggests poverty and lack of nourishment. Synonym
emaciated formal

Animal physiology: thin or slender (of people)

Not fit & healthy
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of someone’s face) thin and anxious, or (of clothing) narrow: Nora was short, with a pinched face, and wore thick glasses with wire rims. Her dress was pinched at the waist.
A person or organization that is pinched does not have enough money: The space program is pinched.
